cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.util

Class Serializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.util.Serializer

  • public class Serializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Serializer is a class meant to translate between Users, Instruments, and Bids, and JSON strings that can be used by the ElasticsearchController.
    See Also:
    User, Instrument, Bid, ElasticsearchController

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Serializer() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String serializeBid(Bid bid)
      Translates a Bid into a JSON string
      java.lang.String serializeInstrument(Instrument instrument)
      Translates a Instrument into a JSON string Calls serializeBid() to translate bids
      java.lang.String serializeUser(User user)
      Translates a User into a JSON string Calls serializeInstrument() to translate owned and borrowed instruments Calls serializeBid() to translate bids
